text: Va onhoe, ki imon ovardaand, (ja'ne, mu'minon dar holi munofiqon dar ta'accuʙ monda ʙa jakdigar) megujand: «Ojo inho hamon kasoneand, ki ʙa Alloh savgandhoi saxt mexurdand, ki ʙo sumo xohand ʙud?», amalhojason, ki dar dunjo ʙa co ovardand ʙa saʙaʙi gumoni ʙadason ʙar islomu musalmonon ʙotil gardid, pas xud dar zumrai zijonkoron daromadand
